name: HENTAI PRINCESS
description:
Welcome to the world of charming princesses! This game will give you a lot of positive emotions! Solve puzzles, undress royal ladies, enjoy beautiful art and steamy animations! This is the REAL HENTAI PRINCESS!

PLAY THE NEW INTELLECTUAL GAME OF 2021!

Everybody thinks they know the secrets of princesses, but most people don’t know that they don't really know anything about royal ladies... uncover the most private of princesses secrets!

Unique Features:

Over 30 levels!
Two game modes!
Challenging puzzles!
Bonus animations!
Sexy princess girls!
Big and juicy buns!
Сream pies!

There's a lot of hentai and a lot of puzzles in this world... This game is the best of both worlds, because you have to click and collect puzzles to unlock art and bonus animations with beautiful princesses. This is the REAL HENTAI PRINCESS!
